hero_slogan: I blend design and performance to bring ideas to life with React, Tailwind, and creativity.
about_paragraph_intro: Passionate Full-Stack Developer, specialized in the
about_paragraph_experience: elegant and intuitive interfaces that leave an impact.
skills_desc_frontend: I create smooth, intuitive, and accessible web and mobile interfaces, focusing on user experience and aesthetics.
skills_desc_backend: I develop server-side architecture, RESTful APIs, and manage databases (NoSQL/SQL) to ensure performance.
skills_desc_tools: Mastery of collaboration tools, version control (Git), and continuous deployment workflows for a professional process.
skills_desc_design: I design visual prototypes and closely collaborate with product/design teams to turn ideas into reality.
